info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 16 at 6:10PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Burke, southeastern Richmond and southwestern Aiken Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 610 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over McBean, or 10 miles north of Waynesboro, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hephzibah, McBean, Augusta Regional Airport, Phinizy Swamp Nature Park, Diamond Lakes Regional Park, New Savannah Bluff Lock & Dam Park and Bennock Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
